channel.title: Changing item prices to tokkul?
channel.description:
The title pretty much explains it all.... but I have asked before and no one helped me, so if anyone knows how to make an item cost a certain amount of tokkul instead of coins, I would really, really appreciate their help...
Thanks ~ Ziege Terra ~
